name: Cyborg Shinobi
description:
Set in the future, a urban ninja has set out set take back the scrolls that have been unjustly stolen from his temple. In order to retrieve the scrolls, he must fight thugs guarding them with his katana and kunai as he makes his way a long the rooftops of a futuristic city.

This game is very much in development, and unfortunately not a far along as I would like it to be. I have plans for the sprites as well as gameplay mechanics and levels, but I am currently choosing to put most of my effort into the sprites, as that is the part I am most passionate about for this particular game. Because of this, the gameplay could end up somewhat lacking, but I will try my best to make it and enjoyable game.

Once I am further along with the game and know what types of suggestions I am looking for I will put that here too.
